messages.subject: Excited New Member!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, My name is Dawn.  I have 3 kids, 7 yo dd, 5 yo dd and a 2.5 yo ds and a baby on the way in about 8 weeks!  :-)   I think I ve read all of John Holts books
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

My name is Dawn. I have 3 kids, 7 yo dd, 5 yo dd and a 2.5 yo ds and a baby on the way in about 8 weeks! :-) I think I've read all of John Holts books and really, really like his philosophy. I've also read alot of Sandra Dodds articles - for support and encouragement mostly! I've always felt play was important and I've always felt learning is best when it is learner directed. It amazes me what my kids learn when I don't interfere!!

Looking very forward to getting to know everyone here and for support and encouragement!

Take care,

Dawn

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
